chinese: 锈以生锈；氧化
english: rust

chinese: 这个旧齿轮锈迹斑斑。
english: This old cog is covered with rust

chinese: n.话题，题目，主题
english: topic

chinese: 他写下一个主题供我们讨论。
english: He wrote down a topic for us to discuss

chinese: n.头痛；头痛的事
english: headache

chinese: 这位男士正在遭受头痛的折磨。
english: The man is suffering from a headache

chinese: m酸橙；（生）石灰，氧化钙 v.撒（刷、涂上、加）石灰
english: lime

chinese: 我往水里放了一些酸橙片，让它更有味道。
english: I put some lime pieces in the water to add some flavor

chinese: n. 倒置
english: inversion

chinese: 在倒立瑜伽姿势中，心脏比头部离地面更高。
english: In inversion yoga poses, the heart is higher from the ground than the head

chinese: n.证物；证据，证明v.证明
english: evidence

chinese: 保留所有的证据来帮助我们破案。
english: Keep every piece of evidence to help us solve the crime

chinese: n.药房
english: pharmacy

chinese: 在这家药房你能找到任何你需要的药物。
english: You can find any medicine you need at this pharmacy

chinese: vL. 积攒
english: accumulate

chinese: 他积累财富以供将来使用。
english: He accumulates wealth for future use

chinese: 区 更换；代替，接替；放回
english: replace

chinese: 让我用新灯泡换掉旧的。
english: Let me replace that old light bulb with a new one

chinese: n.薄雾，雾气；烟雾 v（使）变糊涂
english: haze

chinese: 几缕阳光穿过林间薄雾。
english: A few rays of sunshine shone through the forest haze

chinese: adj.宽大的，宽容的，仁慈的
english: lenient

chinese: 对于我在这次考试中不及格一事，我妈表现得十分宽宏大量。
english: This time, my mom was lenient about me failing the exam

chinese: ad）可靠的，可信赖的
english: reliable

chinese: 我的手机相当靠得住！
english: My mobile phone is very reliable

chinese: adj，交替的，轮流的，间隔的Y（使）,交替，（使）轮流 n，代替者
english: alternate

chinese: 这是晴雨交替的一周。
english: This is a week of alternate sunshine and rain

chinese: 2.纬度，（言论，行动的）自由
english: latitude

chinese: 纬度越高，温度越低。
english: The higher the latitude, the colder the temperature will be

chinese: 口裂痕；破裂；冲击；违反 Y 使有裂口；破坏
english: breach

chinese: 由于大坝出现裂口，形势变得非常危险。
english: The situation became very dangerous because of the breach in the dam

chinese: n 大量；丰富
english: abundance

chinese: 她的冰箱里总有大量的食物。
english: There is always an abundance of food in her fridge
